description: Megalodon was a monsterous shark that ruled the oceans millions of years ago.  Fossil records indicate it could grow to up to 67 feet in length and weigh over 114 tons.  It is arguably the deadliest shark to have ever lived; deadlier even than its reputed descendant, the Great White Shark.  With this free ebook you can read all about this fascinating creature.  The book explores the history of Megalodon's discovery through fossil records, discusses its physical and behavioral characteristics, and even explores the circumstances leading to its extinction. Download it today and read about history's greatest predator!
